DataSource.RecordSource:
SELECT DISTINCT SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID, SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipDetailID, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipNo, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ShippedDate, SO_SaleOrderMaster.Code AS SaleOrderNo, MST_Currency.Code as CurrencyCode, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ExchangeRate,
MST_Party.Code as PartyCode, MST_Party.Name as PartyName,
SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderLine, ITM_Product.ProductID, ITM_Product.Code AS PartNo, ITM_Product.Description as PartName, ITM_Product.Revision as PartModel, ITM_Product.Code + ITM_Product.Description + ITM_Product.Revision as PartInfo, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code AS SellingUM, ITM_Category.Code AS CategoryCode, SO_ConfirmShipDetail.Price as UnitPrice,
( (SELECT SUM( detail.Price * detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) / ( Case When ( SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) = 0 then 1 else ( SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) end )
) as AVGPrice,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID AND detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ConfirmShipDetailID = SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipDetailID ) as Quantity,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID AND detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ConfirmShipDetailID = SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipDetailID ) * SO_ConfirmShipDetail.Price as Amount,
SO_ConfirmShipDetail.VATAmount
FROM SO_ConfirmShipMaster INNER JOIN SO_ConfirmShipDetail ON SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipMasterID INNER JOIN SO_SaleOrderMaster ON SO_ConfirmShipMaster.SaleOrderMasterID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.SaleOrderMasterID INNER JOIN SO_SaleOrderDetail ON SO_ConfirmShipDetail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID INNER JOIN MST_Party ON MST_Party.PartyID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.PartyID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON SO_SaleOrderDetail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_Currency ON SO_ConfirmShipMaster.CurrencyID = MST_Currency.CurrencyID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON SO_SaleOrderDetail.SellingUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID LEFT JOIN ITM_Category ON ITM_Category.CategoryID = ITM_Product.CategoryID
WHERE SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipNo = 'SS1606060001'
ORDER BY ITM_Product.Code, ITM_Product.ProductID
